law.catch_line: Firm not to be considered when committee member or family member employed by or has interest in that firm.

text.section: A selection committee shall not consider a firm for a built-to-suit lease when a member of the committee, his spouse, either of his parents, or any of his children is employed by that firm, or has a financial interest in that firm.

For a period of one (1) year after a person ends his service on a selection committee, the Commonwealth shall not consider a firm for a built-to-suit lease when the person, his spouse, either of his parents, or any of his children is employed by that firm or has a financial interest in that firm.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 54, sec. 7, effective July 14, 1992.
